subject: docs: update all documentation to remove tone category references
body:
- CLAUDE.md: Remove toneFeeling/toneAttitude/toneEnergy class references,
  update theme description to "semantic tone colors"
- README.md: Update tone tags feature description, list all tones without
  category groupings, mention semantic colors
- HISTORY.md: Add comprehensive summary of all changes including
  MessageInfoModal fix, tutorial update, and documentation updates
title: update all documentation to remove tone category references
